description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Campaigns of the Army of the Potomac: a critical history of operations in Virginia, Maryland and Pennsylvania, from the commencement to the close of the war 1861-5" Author: Swinton, William Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.ee.7."
